element.name: TP-MR
element.comment: Parameter identifying the SMS SUBMIT.

field.name: TP-MR
field.comment: Parameter identifying the SMS SUBMIT.

element.name: TP-PID
element.comment: Parameter identifying the above layer protocol, if any.

enum.name: Assigns bits 0 5 for SC specific use
no interworking, but SME to SME protocol
implicit device type is specific to this SC,
enum.comment: or can be concluded on the basis of the address

enum.name: telex (or teletex reduced to telex format)
National Paging system (known to the SC)
a message handling facility (known to the SC)
any public X.400 based message handling system
values specific to each SC,
enum.comment: usage based on mutual agreement between the SME and the SC (7 combinations available for each SC)

enum.name: A GSM mobile station.
enum.comment: The SC converts the SM from the received TP Data Coding Scheme to any data coding scheme supported by that MS (e.g. the default).

element.name: TP-DCS
element.comment: Parameter identifying the coding scheme within the TP User Data.

enum.name: Message Marked for Automatic Deletion Group
the text is compressed using the GSM standard
enum.comment: the text is compressed using the GSM standard compression algorithm. ( see GSM TS 03.42)

enum.name: bits 1 to 0 are reserved and have no message class meaning
bits 1 to 0 have a message class meaning

field.name: TP-UDL
field.description: number of characters in the SMS

element.name: TP-SCTS
element.comment: Parameter identifying time when the SC received the message.

element.name: TP-PI
element.comment: Parameter indicating the presence of any of the optional parameters which follow.

field.name: TP-RP
field.comment: Parameter indicating that Reply Path exists.

enum.name: TP Reply Path parameter is not set in this SMS SUBMIT/DELIVER
TP Reply Path parameter is set in this SMS SUBMIT/DELIVER

field.name: TP-UDHI
field.comment: Parameter indicating that the TP UD field contains a Header.

enum.name: The TP UD field contains only the short message
The beginning of the TP UD field contains a Header in addition to the short message

field.name: TP-SRR
field.comment: Parameter indicating if the MS is requesting a status report.

enum.name: A status report is not requested

field.name: TP-VPF
field.comment: Parameter indicating whether or not the TP VP field is present.

enum.name: TP VP field present - relative format
TP VP field present - absolute format

field.name: TP-RD
field.comment: Parameter indicating whether or not the SC shall accept an SMS SUBMIT for an SM still held in the SC which has the same TP MR and the same TP DA as a previously submitted SM from the same OA.

enum.name: Instruct the SC to accept duplicates
enum.comment: Instruct the SC to accept an SMS SUBMIT for an SM still held in the SC which has the same TP MR and the same TP DA as a previously submitted SM from the same OA.

enum.name: Instruct the SC to reject duplicates
enum.comment: Instruct the SC to reject an SMS SUBMIT for an SM still held in the SC which has the same TP MR and the same TP DA as the previously submitted SM from the same OA. In this case an appropriate TP FCS value will be returned in the SMS SUBMIT REPORT.

field.name: TP-MTI
field.comment: Parameter describing the message type.

element.comment: Parameter identifying the SMS SUBMIT.

element.comment: Parameter identifying the time from where the message is no longer valid.

field.name: NA
field.comment: Not used.

field.name: TP-LP
field.comment: Parameter indicating that SMS applications should inhibit forwarding or automatic message generation that could cause infinite looping.

enum.name: The message has not been forwarded and is not a spawned message
enum.comment: (or the sending network entity (e.g. an SC) does not support the setting of this bit.)

enum.name: The message has either been forwarded or is a spawned message

field.name: TP-MMS
field.comment: Parameter indicating whether or not there are more messages to send.

enum.name: More messages are waiting for the MS in this SC
No more messages are waiting for the MS in this SC

field.comment: Parameter describing the message type.

element.name: TP-ST
element.comment: Parameter identifying the status of the previously sent mobile originated short message.

enum.name: Short message transaction completed, Short message received by the SME
Short message transaction completed, Short message forwarded by the SC to the SME but the SC is unable to confirm delivery
Short message transaction completed, Short message replaced by the SC
Short message transaction completed, Values specific to each SC
Temporary error, SC still trying to transfer SM, Congestion
Temporary error, SC still trying to transfer SM, SME busy
Temporary error, SC still trying to transfer SM, No response from SME
Temporary error, SC still trying to transfer SM, Service rejected
Temporary error, SC still trying to transfer SM, Quality of service not available
Temporary error, SC still trying to transfer SM, Error in SME
Temporary error, SC still trying to transfer SM, Reserved
Temporary error, SC still trying to transfer SM, Values specific to each SC
Permanent error, SC is not making any more transfer attempts, Remote procedure error
Permanent error, SC is not making any more transfer attempts, Incompatible destination
Permanent error, SC is not making any more transfer attempts, Connection rejected by SME
Permanent error, SC is not making any more transfer attempts, Not obtainable
Permanent error, SC is not making any more transfer attempts, Quality of service not available
Permanent error, SC is not making any more transfer attempts, No interworking available
Permanent error, SC is not making any more transfer attempts, SM Validity Period Expired
Permanent error, SC is not making any more transfer attempts, SM Deleted by originating SME
Permanent error, SC is not making any more transfer attempts, SM Deleted by SC Administration
Permanent error, SC is not making any more transfer attempts, SM does not exist
enum.comment: (The SM may have previously existed in the SC but the SC no longer has knowledge of it or the SM may never have previously existed in the SC)

enum.name: Permanent error, SC is not making any more transfer attempts, Reserved

element.name: AbsentSubscriberDiagnosticSM
element.comment: Refers to geographical Information defined in 3GPP TS 23.032.

field.name: value
field.description: time in minutes since the last network contact of the mobile station (i.e. the actuality of the location information).

enum.name: no paging response via the MSC
deregistered in the HLR for non GPRS
no paging response via the SGSN
deregistered in the HLR for GPRS
deregistered in the HSS/HLR for IMS

element.name: AgeOfLocationInformation
element.comment: Refers to geographical Information defined in 3GPP TS 23.032.

field.name: value
field.description: time in minutes since the last network contact of the mobile station (i.e. the actuality of the location information).

enum.name: The message is sent from the side that originates the TI
The message is sent to the side that originates the TI

Unacknowledged GTP; Acknowledged LLC and RLC, Protected data

Unacknowledged GTP, LLC, and RLC, Protected data

ES IND option is implemented in the MS (if A/Gb mode supported)

no preference for the default alphabet
